title: New Call of Duty Possibly Names " Modern Warfare" - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.24.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Snowbike Mike and Fran "FM3" Mirabella go over the rumored Call of Dutry Modern Warfare, word of a Star Wars KOTOR movie and a lot more! 

Time Stamps - 
00:01:54 - Housekeeping
Andrea will be in London this weekend at the What’s Good Games Meet Up on Sunday May 26th at the Marquis of Westminster from 3-6pm - see more details on her Twitter @andrearene or at Facebook.com/whatsgoodgames
The Roper Report   -
